ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Quick question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... While the policy is that they keep the characters for 3 months, Verant has *never* actually followed thru with that policy.  The only mass deletion of
ygData.messageBody:
> From: "Whitmore, Lance" <lwhitmore@...>
>
> They are kept on the server for 3 months, then deleted there after. Gives
> you time to change your mind. That's at least how the policy stood when I
> was a guide, may have changed since.

While the policy is that they keep the characters for 3 months, Verant has
*never* actually followed thru with that policy. The only "mass deletion"
of characters was before Luclin when they deleted lvl 1 chars from every
account.

I've known people gone for a year that have reactivated their accounts and
their characters were there.

Sulamwen
Pathfinder
E'ci
